text: In the Name of the Father is a 1993 Irish British biographical drama movie directed by Jim Sheridan and was based on the 1990 autobiography Proven Innocent by Gerry Conlon. It stars Daniel Day-Lewis, Pete Postlethwaite, Emma Thompson, Corin Redgrave, Beatie Edney, John Benfield, Paterson Joseph, Frank Harper, Tom Wilkinson, Saffron Burrows and was nominated for 7 Academy Awards in 1994. It was distributed by Universal Pictures. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1993 drama movies Category:1990s biographical movies Category:Irish biographical movies Category:Irish drama movies Category:British biographical movies Category:1990s British drama movies Category:Movies about lawyers Category:Movies about miscarriage of justice Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Jim Sheridan Category:Universal Pictures movies Category:Movies set in Belfast Category:Movies about the Irish Republican Army
title: In the Name of the Father (1993 movie)
